get.summary:
Gets a case based on the case number with general details and/or optional invoices details,
events, events planned, notes or letters sent
Get a letter based on the case number and the letter's unique id
Gets a list of new cases or cases with status changed  based on a search criteria
Gets a list of cases by status, status group or case type
Gets a list of all cases having new messages
Gets a list of all cases with changes since a provided date

post.summary: Adds a document to a case

get.summary: Gets a list of cases (successful and failed) based on Batch Id or on Invoice Number and Customer Number
Gets a list of cases filtered by casenumber, reference 1, reference 2, debtor name or social number

post.summary: Returns a payment link for a case or creates a new payment link.

requestBody.description: Details of the payment link request

get.summary: Searches for cases based on Social Number (Requires Special Authorization)
Get unpaid debt based on Social Number and Organization Number (Requires Special Authorization)

post.summary: Get external case info (Requires Special Authorization)

get.summary: Checks if case number exists in Sidra

parameters.name: caseNumber
parameters.description: The case number to be checked

200.description: Returned if the case number exists

404.description: Returned if the case number does not exist

get.summary: Gets a list of contracts for the user based on specified filters
Gets the list of possible contract statuses for each contract type

post.summary: Updates status of a contract based on contract status id. User must have access to the contract

parameters.name: contractStatusId
parameters.description: Contract status id to be updated

requestBody.description: New status for the specified contract type

post.summary: Creates a message on a case
Creates a list of meter records

requestBody.description: List of meter records with details

get.summary: Gets a list of either statuses, status groups or case types
